Txt_Talk_SpiritShrine_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_012.Text: *: You can't fool us faeries with a simple trick like that! I can seee yooou!
*: I absolutely hate smelly old humans. All except Ortega, that is. He's lovely!
*: I just know he'll give the Lord of the Underworld the thrashing he deserves!

Txt_Talk_SpiritShrine_1F_SUB_0_VOLUME_01.Text: *: I met him once, you know.
*: I was ambushed by monsters and he came to my rescue... Ahh, what a kind soul.
*: I absolutely hate smelly old humans. All except Ortega, that is. He's lovely!
*: Not quite sure what to think of you yet, though...
*: Anyway, back when I met him, Ortega said he had lost all his memories.
*: Strange to imagine, but he might not recognise you even if you do find him again.
*: Just...do your best to help him, alright?
*: Then I'll have a reason to not hate you, smelly old human.

Txt_Talk_SpiritShrine_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_012.Text: *: You can't fool us faeries with a simple trick like that! I can seee yooou!
*: Oh, I do hope you find Ortega soon.

Txt_Talk_SpiritShrine_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_011.Text: *: You can't fool us faeries with a simple trick like that! I can seee yooou!
*: So it was you who defeated the Lord of the Underworld, was it? But where was Ortega? He's not... Is he...?

Txt_Talk_SpiritShrine_2F_MAIN_0_ACTOR_02.Text: Hi there. I'm the faerie who used to work for Rubiss, by the way.
And it was me who called out to you the day you turned sixteen.
Rubiss had enough on her plate back then, so I decided to step in and help out.
Honestly, I think I might have actually been a bit blunt with you that day. Sorry about that.
No hard feelings? Anyway, you're here now, and that's what matters.
And you've even freed Rubiss too! Is there anything you can't do? I'm just wondering. You don't actually have to answer...
Now, you just need to take care of the small matter of Zoma. Here, let me give you the Staff of Rain.
Now, listen to me very carefully.
If you're to stand a chance of reaching the Lord of the Underworld, then you'll need help from Rubiss.
Unfortunately, Zoma currently holds her prisoner, and that's where you come in.
She is trapped on the top floor of a spire locals know as the <6>Tower of Rubiss<9>. It stands on a small isle to the north.
First, you'll need to find the faerie flute. Once you have it, you'll be able to awaken Rubiss and free her from Zoma's clutches.
Oh my, you already have the faerie flute! Well, that makes things simple.
Now then, let me give you this staff. You humans do like staves, don't you?
Anyway, make a start by heading to the village of Kol. I've got a feeling someone there might be able to point you in the right direction.
Oh, let me give you the Staff of Rain. You humans do like staves, right?
{HERO} obtains the Staff of Rain!

<6>When rain and sun, the twain do meet,
The rain's bow shall a bridge complete.<9>
Well, fingers crossed this staff ends up being of use.
<IfSolo({LEADER},The party)>'s HP and MP are restored!
Take care, anyway. You'll be fine I'm sure, but I'll pray for your safety just in case.
You can't fool us faeries with a simple trick like that! I can seee yooou!

<6>When rain and sun, the twain do meet,
The rain's bow shall a bridge complete.<9>
Well, fingers crossed this staff ends up being of use.
Take care, anyway. You'll be fine I'm sure, but I'll pray for your safety just in case.
You can't fool us faeries with a simple trick like that! I can seee yooou!
Thanks so much, {MOST_HEROIC}. We'll never forget what you've done for us.
Rubiss told me She's looking forward to meeting you again some day...
